channel.title: 99 cooking
channel.description:
This is the one i am planning on, here are my plans..
I am at 75 right now.
80-90 -- monks
90-99 -- shark
I am doing lobsters until 80, I know this may seem like a pointless topic, but if you have 99 cooking, can you give me some advice before i screw something up?
Is my plan alright? My friend lost 6m getting 99 cooking.. and im not sure how..

item.title: 99 cooking
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

The Un-Named:

[quote author=Frell link=topic=216132.msg1883025#msg1883025 date=1195196011]wich is about 98 hours of cooking.

That will only take say, 25 days, cooking for 4 hours a day. You’ll never burn any so you can potentially gain money, or you can spend 19 days cooking for 4 hours a day and loose money.[/quote]
I spend 3 hours a day on weekdays, and thanksgiving break is coming up, so on days with no school, i will be playing 12-14 hours a day because all my friends are out of town. Im planning to have it by next friday or saturday.

Read full topic

item.title: 99 cooking
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Frell:

wich is about 98 hours of cooking.

That will only take say, 25 days, cooking for 4 hours a day. You’ll never burn any so you can potentially gain money, or you can spend 19 days cooking for 4 hours a day and loose money.

Read full topic

item.title: 99 cooking
item.dc:creator: @sonny_bill_9 ``jason
item.description:
@sonny_bill_9 wrote:

im not a member but after 31 im pretty sure that there is a bank behind the door to the stove. Try there

Read full topic

item.title: 99 cooking
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

The only tip i can give you is to cook in rogues den… which 99% of people know about=D

Read full topic

item.title: 99 cooking
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

From 83-99 Cooking I had a spare 80m laying around so I just spent 55m on 52k sharks and got it in 1 week, and I made 25m off 99 Cooking…

But if your on a budget, I’d say Lobs until 94, then Sharks until 99.

But make sure you have Cooking guantlets.

Read full topic

item.title: 99 cooking
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

98 hours and 4 hours or even 5 hours a day. Thats only about 20 days to get 99. Pretty fast. Next, I would try firemaking or hunting. Firemaking take about a month and hunter about the same.

Read full topic

item.title: 99 cooking
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:2, topic:158603”]If you plan on fishing, use lobbys to 99(on both cooking and fishing). There faster than sharks thus, more xp.

If not, check the market often. Find what you can buy raw and sell cooked without loosing much(hey, don’t expect to get 99 cooking for free and without fishing!)[/quote]
lobsters and monks stay the same raw and cooked, I buy all my food. Lobsters are the fastest way to 99 but for every 1k lobs takes 1 hour to cook, wich is about 98 hours of cooking.

Read full topic

item.title: 99 cooking
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

If you plan on fishing, use lobbys to 99(on both cooking and fishing). There faster than sharks thus, more xp.

If not, check the market often. Find what you can buy raw and sell cooked without loosing much(hey, don’t expect to get 99 cooking for free and without fishing!)

Read full topic
